text: "Sha La La" is a song written by Robert Mosley and Robert Taylor and performed by Manfred Mann. It reached #3 on the UK Singles Chart and #12 on both the U.S. pop chart and the Canadian chart in 1965. It was featured on their 1965 album The Five Faces of Manfred Mann. ==Other charting versions== *The Shirelles released the original version of the song as a single in 1964 which reached #15 on the U.S. R&B; chart and #69 on the U.S. pop chart. ==Other versions== *The Ventures released a version of the song on their 1964 album Knock Me Out! *Gary Lewis & the Playboys released a version of the song on their 1965 album Everybody Loves a Clown. *Enoch Light and His Light Brigade released a version of the song on their 1967 EP Discotheque Vol. 2. *The Manfreds released a version of the song on their 1999 album L.I.V.E. ==References== Category:1964 songs Category:1964 singles Category:Manfred Mann songs Category:The Shirelles songs Category:The Ventures songs Category:Gary Lewis & the Playboys songs Category:Song recordings produced by Snuff Garrett Category:United Artists Records singles Category:Scepter Records singles Category:Songs written by Robert Mosley
title: Sha La La
